args.text: A peaceful garden path. Afternoon sunlight filters through rose bushes.

args.description: A peculiar mechanical humming emanates from beneath a rose bush, like tiny gears turning

args.direction: investigate the source of the humming
args.motivation: you're obsessed with mechanical things and this sounds like something with moving parts - you absolutely MUST know how it works

args.description: A smooth iridescent stone sits nestled in soil, vibrating and producing the mechanical hum

args.direction: pick up the stone and examine it closely
args.motivation: you're convinced this is some kind of magnificent machine and you want to figure out how to use it - maybe it could power a motor-car

args.description: The stone's humming changes pitch, creating a pleasant musical harmony

args.direction: call out to Callie to come see this amazing discovery
args.motivation: you're bursting with excitement about this mechanical marvel and you want to show off your find to a friend - maybe she'll be as impressed as you are

args.description: The stone's musical harmony grows more complex, layering melodies together

args.direction: move closer to Toad and ask what he's found
args.motivation: you're genuinely curious about what's making that beautiful sound and you want to understand what Toad is so excited about

args.description: The stone pulses with warm golden light in rhythm with its music

args.direction: gently reach out and touch the stone
args.motivation: you feel drawn to it - there's something tender and inviting about the warm glow and you wonder if touching it will reveal something about its nature

args.description: The stone's tune shifts to something joyful and bright when Callie touches it

args.direction: express delight about the stone's response and suggest taking it on an adventure
args.motivation: you're thrilled that the stone seems magical and you want to share this amazing experience with Callie - this could be the start of a grand adventure

args.text: The singing stone continues its cheerful melody. The afternoon light grows golden.
